channel.title: Software on Kyle Rassweiler
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Kyle Rassweiler

item.title: Daily Driver Challenge Hard(er) Mode Part 0
item.description:
The Linus Tech Tips Daily Driver Challenge is an attempt at using a linux system as your main rig. The hard(er) mode version is using Arch and i3wm as the os of choice.

Part 0 of this challenge will be testing the feasibility of arch-gaming using a kvm virtual machine. After successfully installing the os I will test installing and playing games through steam.

item.title: Easy Install Guide For Arch Linux Using BTRFS
item.description: This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with a BTRFS file system including subvolumes. This guide also covers using snapper and grub to create bootable snapshots.

item.title: KRello
item.description:
A simple clone of the well known kanban system Trello. Currently there isn’t a database attached beyond the react browser, but the user is able to add boards and cards.

There is also drag-n-drop functionality.

item.title: Banana Breeding Bureau
item.description:
A simple web game built using Godot and Blender.

The goal is to plant banana trees and have unit collect dropped bananas in order to ship them to orbit.

Give the game a Look!
